con:testCase.name: BadCase-RatorService-topUp
con:testCase.con:description: In most of test-cases is expected either soap-Fault response or drc-response with error-code=102! Tests negativ technical test-cases from Rator / PSST evolution service: topupBulkAsynchronous and topupSynchronous based on documentation in svn: ...src\trunk\SRs\Interfaces\RATOR-PSST\ST_TD_DRC_U-036_PSST_Interface_Specification-V3.2.1.pdf ยง 4.2.3
